new.Description:
Also known as Methane Gas. It is the lightest crude oil distillate and is often used as fuel for oil refineries.
May also be reformed to produce 'Syngas', a mixture of Hydrogen and Carbon Monoxide.
Can be burned in Solution Heaters.

old.Description:
Also known as Methane Gas. It is the lightest crude oil distillate and is often used as fuel for oil refineries.
 May also be reformed to produce 'Syngas', a mixture of Hydrogen and Carbon Monoxide.
